member.name: IPersistFolder.Initialize
member.summary: Instructs a Shell folder object to initialize itself based on the information passed.
member.param: The address of the (item identifier list) structure that specifies the absolute location of the folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPersistFolder
member.summary: Exposes a method that initializes Shell folder objects.
